p: The condyles were round and spherical in fetuses with a CRL of 24.5 mm (CS22). The lateral condyle appeared round in fetuses with a CRL of 48.0 mm, which changed to angular in the posterior view in fetuses with a CRL of 56.5 mm ( Fig 5C). The upper portions of the condyles also became angular in the lateral view in fetuses with a CRL of 75.0 mm.
